MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL25 postcode area of Dolwyddelan, affecting properties in a widespread area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a damaged electricity pole and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:32 am on 27th October, 2020.
